    Interface and Description

  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.spf4j.base.Callables.FibonacciBackoffRetryPredicate
    use RetryPolicy

    use RetryPolicy
    org.spf4j.base.Callables.TimeoutCallable
    use RetryPolicy
    org.spf4j.base.CallablesNano
    use RetryPolicy & co.
    org.spf4j.base.CallablesNanoNonInterrupt
    org.spf4j.base.Holder
    use java.util.Optional
    org.spf4j.base.IntMath.XorShift32ThreadSafe
    please use JDK java.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalRandom instead. The JDK implementation uses local fields in the Thread class instead of a classic ThreadLocal, which makes it faster...
    org.spf4j.base.TimeoutRunnable
    use RetryPolicy
    org.spf4j.unix.Ulimit
    see UnixResources for better/faster alternative.
    org.spf4j.concurrent.UnboundedRacyLoadingCache
    use UnboundedLoadingCache instead.

    use CharSequences.compare
    org.spf4j.base.CharSequences.compareTo(CharSequence, CharSequence)
    use compare.
    org.spf4j.base.Strings.contains(CharSequence, char...)
    use CharSequences.containsAnyChar instead.

    use CharSequences.distance instead.

    use RetryPolicy

    use OperatingSystem.forkExec.

    use OperatingSystem.forkExec instead.
    org.spf4j.base.Runtime.run(String[], Runtime.ProcOutputHandler, long, long)
    use OperatingSystem.forkExec instead.
    org.spf4j.base.Strings.subSequence(CharSequence, int, int)
    org.spf4j.base.Callables.toFailsafePredicate(Callables.AdvancedRetryPredicate<Exception>)
    use this method to migrate from deprecated API to new APIs (failsafe)
    org.spf4j.base.Method.toWriter(Writer)
    use writeTo.

  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.spf4j.io.PipedOutputStream(int, long)
    use constructor that takes globalDeadlineNanos.

    use constructor that takes globalDeadlineNanos.
